response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this item at an exclusive price of $10,800. This represents a significant saving for you while still allowing me to receive a fair return for the value provided. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both of us.
